title: Letter Beasties Children's Rhyming ABC Book of Funny Monsters
description: Meet your new BEaST friends in this completely unique ABC book! From the alien A to the zombie Z, the alphabet is now full of loveable Beastie monsters. Emmy AwardÂ® winning animation director Ron Noble has transformed letters into lovable creatures from folklore. It's so much fun, kids won't even realize they're learning their ABC's.
author: Ron Noble
